function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"GPS location tracking of positive patients","Impact":"Privacy invasion, potential for misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Use anonymized data, obtain informed consent from users","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, robust data encryption","People":"Positive patients, general public","Owner":"Ministry of Interior and Safety, app developers"},{"Description":"Monitoring financial transactions, GPS location, and CCTV footage","Impact":"Privacy invasion, potential for misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Strict data protection laws, informed consent from users","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure storage systems","People":"General public","Owner":"Ministry of Interior and Safety, app developers"},{"Description":"Transmission of personal data to all individuals in the area","Impact":"Privacy invasion, potential for misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Use anonymized data, limit data transmission to necessary contacts","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, data access control","People":"Affected individuals in the area","Owner":"Ministry of Interior and Safety, app developers"}]}
